Welcome to the Oregon Trail!
In this game you will play as the young Hattie Campbell, traveling the trail with her family. To start, you will choose the names of your family members.
Next, you will be taken to the General Store where you can buy supplies for the trail. Be sure to save some money for river ferries and fort shops.
